name: Wizard Duel (ColtonH1)
description:
This is a player versus AI card game. 

The game is magical themed, so the cards are spells to be cast.

The player is given mana each round and can either choose to spend the mana or save up for a stronger card by passing, discarding, or playing a card that doesn't cost mana. 

As the sole contributor, all code was developed by me, all design choices are my own, and all UI/UX are mine.

The cards were created by me by using public domain photos.

This game was developed completely by me with the exception of the assets used. Assets such as: pictures, fonts, and sounds. Every asset was checked to make sure they are free for public domain and are allowed commercial use without the need to credit.
